greeting: Vote according to your opinion in Sandik and freely share your opinion about other votes!
aboutTheAppText: Sandik is a global survey platform created to learn and interpret the ideas of many people. It offers you objective and unbiased results that you are curious about and that you can use for your public research. You can also freely share your thoughts and contribute to the results by participating in the surveys. As part of the protection of personal opinions, the information of the voters will not be shared with the survey owner in any way. The poll owner will only be able to see the voting result as a percentage. You can find answers to your questions that are difficult to predict by taking part in Sandik. Come on,
githubText: For Open Source Codes of Our Project..
